rules.name: alwaysPickFlowersFromPots
rules.description: Right-clicking on a flowerpot containing a flower will always put the flower into your inventory.

rules.name: creativePlayerOneHitKill
rules.description: Allows players in Creative mode to kill entities in one hit. This only works on non-player entities.

rules.name: disableMobSpawningInEnd
rules.description: Disables mobs from spawning in the End.

rules.name: disableMobSpawningInNether
rules.description: Disables mobs from spawning in the Nether.

rules.name: disableMobSpawningInOverworld
rules.description: Disables mobs from spawning in the Overworld.

rules.name: disablePhantomSpawningForCreativePlayers
rules.description: Phantoms will no longer spawn for creative players.

rules.name: disablePhantomSpawningInMushroomFields
rules.description: Phantoms will no longer spawn around a player that is in a mushroom fields biome.

rules.name: dispensersPlaceEyesOfEnder
rules.description: Dispensers can place eyes of ender into end portal frames.

rules.name: dispensersRemoveEyesOfEnder
rules.description: Dispensers can remove eyes of ender from full end portal frames. Any connecting end portals will break.

rules.name: dropAllXpOnPlayerDeath
rules.description: When a player dies, all of their XP will be dropped.

rules.name: dropEyesOfEnderFromEndPortalFrame
rules.description: A full end portal frame will drop an eye of ender when right clicked by a player, turning into an empty end portal frame in the process. Any connecting end portals will break.

rules.name: endermenSpawnOnlyInTheEnd
rules.description: Disables endermen from spawning in the Overworld and Nether, only allowing them to spawn in the End.

rules.name: movableEmptyEndPortalFrames
rules.description:
Allows empty end portal frames to be moved.
The `drop_as_items_on_explosion` option will allow end portal frames to drop as items when an explosion occurs whilst being pushed by a piston.

rules.name: movableSpawners
rules.description: Allows spawners to be moved.
validators: This requires the `movableBlockEntities` carpet rule to be enabled

rules.name: netheriteAxeInstantMineWood
rules.description: A netherite axe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine wood and nether wood type blocks.

rules.name: netheritePickaxeInstantMineBlueIce
rules.description: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine blue ice blocks.

rules.name: netheritePickaxeInstantMineCobblestone
rules.description: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine cobblestone type blocks.

rules.name: netheritePickaxeInstantMineDeepslate
rules.description: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine deepslate type blocks.

rules.name: netheritePickaxeInstantMineEndStone
rules.description: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine end stone type blocks.

rules.name: netheritePickaxeInstantMineNetherBricks
rules.description: A netherite pickaxe with efficiency V combined with the haste II status effect will instant mine nether brick type blocks.

rules.name: passiveEndermen
rules.description: Endermen will not be provoked by the player when attacked or looked at. They will still be provoked by other mobs.

rules.name: phantomsObeyHostileMobCap
rules.description: Phantoms will no longer spawn if the hostile mobcap is full. This is per player.

rules.name: pickFlowersFromPots
rules.description: Right-clicking on a flowerpot with a flower in it will put the flower into your inventory

rules.name: portalSpectatorDelay
rules.description: Amount of delay ticks to use a nether portal in spectator mode. Requires the `spectatorPlayersUsePortals` rule to be enabled.
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 72000

rules.name: replaceFlowersInPots
rules.description: When right clicking a flower pot with a pottable item, it will replace the item that already was in the pot.

rules.name: replaceableFlowers
rules.description: Placing blocks on flowers will replace them like grass.

rules.name: spawnEggsSpawnMobsWithNoAI
rules.description: A spawn egg will spawn a mob with no AI.

rules.name: spectatorPlayersUsePortals
rules.description: Spectator players can go through nether portals, end portals and end gateways.

rules.name: stonecuttersDoDamage
rules.description: When a stonecutter is powered by redstone, it will damage entities standing on top of it.

rules.name: xpBubbleColumnInteraction
rules.description: Bubble columns will push or pull XP orb entities like with other entities and items.
